channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hello! Nhk World Japan
channel.desc: We introduce a documentary program exploring Japanese Ig Nobel laureates and the serious aims and stories behind their humorous, thought-provoking research.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hometown Stories
channel.desc: Stories about people, stories about life. Intimate portraits of people from around Japan, each leading diverse lives while enriching lives of others.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dig More Japan
channel.desc: In Japan's aging society, lifestyle choices that promote health and longevity are the new norm. We dig a little deeper.

channel.name: NHK World JP

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: In 2018, Okayama Prefecture's town of Mabi was severely damaged by flooding from heavy rain and many people died in their homes. We'll examine new measures being taken to combat home flooding.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: Hisayama Town in southern Japan has held health checkups since the 1960s. Using this data, Kyushu University identified two markers linked to early dementia. We present the latest findings.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Journeys In Japan
channel.desc: Elisabeth Llopis explores Nishio (Aichi), a historic town that is one of Japan's largest producers of matcha.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: For 25 years, Kamijo Yoko has been engaging with Palestinian painters and children. In May 2024, she held an exhibition of their artwork in Japan. She talks about her connection to the Gaza Strip.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: The Star Festival
channel.desc: For the annual Tanabata Star Festival, families across Edo flew bamboo stalks adorned with strips of paper and ornaments representing wishes. We examine what their wishes tell us about their lives.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dining With The Chef
channel.desc: Chef Saito's authentic recipes: (1) Chilled Ramen Noodles (2) Chilled Tofu. Learn about Japanese home cooking, based on traditional Japanese cooking techniques.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Document 72 Hours
channel.desc: A discount women's clothing store in Ueno, Tokyo. The shop attracts customers for many reasons. We spent 3 days listening to their stories.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Science View
channel.desc: To realize a sustainable society, large wooden buildings are being created around the world. Japan's revolutionary "unburning wood" now contributes greatly to possibilities for wooden architecture.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Journeys In Japan
channel.desc: Elisabeth Llopis explores Nishio (Aichi), a historic town that is one of Japan's largest producers of matcha.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Deeper Look
channel.desc: An experienced anchor Del Irani has a cutting-edge dialogue with a first-class guest on a current-affairs topics.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dining With The Chef Mini
channel.desc: Featured recipe: Beef with Kombu Dashi Sauce Learn about Japanese home cooking with Master Chef Saito, based on traditional Japanese cooking techniques in five minutes.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan's Top Inventions
channel.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: lotion tissues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Frontrunners
channel.desc: Kitayama Yasuo is a master gardener, specializing in rock gardens. His final project is in a city devastated by a tsunami. His goal is to create a garden where people can heal, through love for life.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Science View
channel.desc: To realize a sustainable society, large wooden buildings are being created around the world. Japan's revolutionary "unburning wood" now contributes greatly to possibilities for wooden architecture.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Kabuki Kool
channel.desc: Actor Kataoka Ainosuke explores a kabuki dance in which two actors play a total of eight different roles featuring Tokyo's famous Sanja Festival.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dive In Tokyo
channel.desc: We visit Shibaura on the edge of Tokyo Bay and unravel its transformation from a maritime hub to a town of high-rise condos. Throughout its history, it has played a key role in Tokyo's development.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Kimura Masahiko is a legend of the bonsai world who has won the Prime Minister's Award, one of the industry's highest honors, 27 times. He talks about creating original works that break the mold.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsline Asia 24
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk News 7
channel.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Herbal Symphony
channel.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo
channel.desc: Enoki are the most produced mushroom in Japan. The thin, white mushrooms are a staple ingredient in hot pot dishes. Check out amazing cultivation methods and feast your eyes on some unique recipes.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Biz Stream
channel.desc: This episode introduces two aquaculture companies that have turned to new types of fish to overcome challenges in their quest for sustainable seafood production.
